    Pavitra Prabhu - Data Scientist

    Data scientist with domain expertise in Banking and Finance. Experience in predictive analytics, data modeling, machine learning and data visualization.

    Contact me!

    Hi, I'm Pavitra Prabhu, and analyzing data is my passion and my profession. 👨🏻‍💻

    I am delighted to:

    1. Uncover meaningful insights in data
    2. Create beautiful dashboards and visuals and develop apps using Python and R
    3. Make data easier to interpret and perform machine learning

    I solve data problems by:

    data cleaning, data wrangling, data exploration, data visualization, understanding the statistics, performing machine learning, engaging others, building user interfaces, and communicating often.
